Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute near 87th/State
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses temp. rerouted WB: 87th, King Dr, 83rd, Lafayette, and 87th; EB: 87th, Lafayette, 95th, King Dr, and 87th near 87th/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses temporarily rerouted in both directions due to, street blockage near 87th/State.

Westbound buses will operate via 87th, King Drive, 83rd, Lafayette, and 87th. 

Eastbound buses will operate via 87th, Lafayette, 95th, King Drive, and 87th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan, #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/116th
ShortDescription: SB 34 South Michigan and 119 Michigan/119th buses are temp. rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/116th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan, and #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/116th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays at Kimball. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays at Kimball.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
